thread.section_title: Kasamba Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Kasamba | kasamba.com
thread.title: m

author: m
title: m
text: I have tried most other psychic sites and Kasamba is the one I most come back to regularly. I had never had a psychic reading chat before - and randomly tried Kasamba while a friend was over just due to the chat function, and didn't think too much of it until the predictions actually came to pass and I was blown away. I have been a regular ever since. Of course with such a variety of readers it is fun to try them but you will find the ones best for you and can help you in those difficult moments. Their advisors are the real deal. Funnily the advisor that I tried first was actually the best one for me - though it has been very nice speaking to the others and they have all assisted me in some way. Customer service is also the best I have ever experienced (hands down) against any of the other sites and this greatly separates them from the rest and keeps me coming back. My tip is that the most expensive advisors with the highest ratings have not necessarily been then best for me - however the cheapest ones were not great for me either.
